rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0001
rows.name:
Boss! Tora has a favor
to ask you as a man.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0002
rows.name:
Please teach Tora the principles
of being an adventurer.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0003
rows.name: The principles of being an adventurer?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0004
rows.name:
Boss is Tora's role model!
That's why Tora wants to
learn everything about Boss!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0005
rows.name: Tora, why this all of a sudden?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0006
rows.name:
Come now, Rex. Just share your wisdom
without making a big deal of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0007
rows.name:
Indeed. It's quite unusual
for Masterpon to make such
a sincere request.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0008
rows.name:
Exactly! Tora is more
serious than ever!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0009
rows.name:
As proof, please look at
these straightforward eyes!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0010
rows.name: I see your pupils are dilated.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0011
rows.name:
Seems like you've been
staying up too late.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0012
rows.name: You should get to bed early tonight.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0013
rows.name:
Aaah, enough! Tora's
tired eyes don't matter.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0014
rows.name:
The point is! Tora
wants to be like Boss!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0015
rows.name: Boss, please!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0016
rows.name: How should I answer him?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0017
rows.name:
I'll teach you all that
life's taught me!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0018
rows.name:
Wouldn't it be better
to learn from Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm so grateful! This
is really exciting.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0102
rows.name:
Listen, Tora. To become
a full-fledged adult...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0103
rows.name:
First, take good care
of your work tools!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0104
rows.name:
Tora already does that I make sure
Hana is shiny and clean every day.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0105
rows.name:
Indeed, I am meticulously
maintained every day.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0106
rows.name:
Second, treasure the bonds
with your companions!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0107
rows.name:
Because you can't handle big jobs
without trustworthy companions!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0108
rows.name: Hmm hmm, I see, mo...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0109
rows.name:
Since Tora has always worked
alone until now, that part
is still unfamiliar to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0110
rows.name: The third point is the most crucial...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0111
rows.name: What is it, Mo-mo?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0112
rows.name:
It's knowing exactly when
to pull up your salvage!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0113
rows.name: I see! That seems very important.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0114
rows.name: ...Wait... 'pull up your salvage'?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0115
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0116
rows.name:
If you misjudge it, all your
preparation work goes to waste.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0117
rows.name:
You could end up losing all the
valuable items you managed to find...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0119
rows.name:
Hey, Rex, aren't you talking
about salvaging principles?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0120
rows.name: Uh? Yeah, why?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0121
rows.name:
Hold on. Why has the topic
changed to salvaging, Mo-mo?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0122
rows.name:
But you asked about adventurer's
advice... And what greater adventure
is there than salvaging?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0123
rows.name:
Tora wants to learn about being a
Driver! Don't care about salvaging!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0124
rows.name: Huuuh?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0125
rows.name:
Masterpon, asking Rex about Driver
techniques appears to be futile.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0126
rows.name:
That's because Rex is
still a novice himself.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0127
rows.name: ...How disappointing.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0128
rows.name:
I really thought you were interested
in becoming a salvager...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0129
rows.name: ...Never mind. I'll ask Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0130
rows.name: Hold on, Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0131
rows.name:
One more time... Give
me one more chance!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0201
rows.name:
So what you want to learn about is
how to be a proper Driver, correct?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0202
rows.name: That's right!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0203
rows.name:
Is this because I mentioned
to Masterpon that his weapon
handling needs improvement?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0204
rows.name: How could I not be bothered by that!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0205
rows.name:
Weapon handling is crucial
for the partnership between
Driver and Blade!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0206
rows.name:
After being told I'm not
good at it, my manly pride
demands that I improve!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0207
rows.name: I see why this is important to you...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0208
rows.name:
All the more reason you
should ask Nia, right?
She has more experience.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0209
rows.name: Ugh, alright. I'll go talk to her, mo.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0210
rows.name:
She just told me that with
experience, my body will naturally
remember what to do, mo...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0211
rows.name: It feels like I was brushed off...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0212
rows.name: Too bad...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0213
rows.name:
Well in that case, I'll give
you some advice myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0214
rows.name:
I'd say Homura and I work
pretty well together.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0215
rows.name:
Incidentally, Nia had something
to say about you too, Boss.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0216
rows.name:
She said 'He's still a novice himself,
so he's pretty bad at it...'

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0218
rows.name: Whaaat...!?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0219
rows.name: So that's what she thinks...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0220
rows.name: Boss, cheer up...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0221
rows.name:
Exactly. You'll improve
with practice...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0222
rows.name: Yeah, I'll keep at it...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0223
rows.name:
How did the one giving
advice end up being the one
needing encouragement...
